title: Meyer-Burling Engagement
maintext:
Dale and Lisa Meyer, of Kankakee, are pleased to announce the approaching marriage of their daughter, Jessica Meyer, to Tim Burling, both of Champaign.
The groom is the son of Don and the late Candy Burling, of Kankakee. The couple will be married Sept. 15 at I Hotel in Champaign with the reception to follow.
